explains: v. 向（人，机构）捐赠，资助；赋予

sentences.en: Herbs have been used for centuries to endow a whole range of foods with subtle flavours.
sentences.cn: 香草几个世纪以来一直被用来赋予各种食品细腻的味道。

sentences.en: They were deploring their parents' omission to endow them with so splendid a means of appealing to the Zamindar.
sentences.cn: 他们在抱怨着他们的父母没有赋予他们这种向地主请愿的卓越口才。

sentences.en: The golden tassels endow the pulpit with garishness and nobleness.
sentences.cn: 金色的流苏使整个讲道坛富显华贵，气度不凡。
